overview: A web-based dashboard for visualizing and analyzing business metrics in real time.

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Allow users to securely log in and manage their accounts.
acceptance_criteria: Users can register and log in

features.name: Customizable Dashboards
features.description: Users can create and customize dashboards with widgets.
acceptance_criteria: Users can add, remove, and rearrange widgets

features.name: Data Export
features.description: Export dashboard data to CSV or PDF.
acceptance_criteria: Users can export data in multiple formats

timeline: Q3 2025: MVP launch; Q4 2025: Feature expansion
